oai_dc:dc.dc:title: BVD Vaccines - Is There An Answer
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Cortese, Victor
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: bovine viral diarrhea virus
clinical signs
immune suppression
vaccine
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Problems associated with bovine viral diarrhea virus (BVD) infections seem to be increasing in the United States. I get many questions from veterinarians and investigate more and more BVD infected herds. Most of these herds do not exhibit any outward clinical signs of BVD infection but reproductive problems or underlying immune suppression are often seen.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1992: Volume 2; 152-154
